features: Adjustable elastic sternum strap: An elastic sternum strap enables your chest to expand when you're breathing heavily.
3D light harness: Light harness construction disperses the load for more comfort and stability. Perforated foam stays cooler against your body.
Removable webbing belt: This simple strap enhances stability and can be removed for a cleaner look.
1 main compartment with full zipped opening
1 internal blader sleeve with hanging loop
1 external top pocket for small items, including key holder
YKK zipper: Top quality, very durable and reliable zippers.
Extra loops: Customize your pack by hooking small items to these loops, or add a bungee to secure items.
